H0.text: Who wrote the book 'Friends, Voters, Countrymen' about his election as MP for Henley-on-Thames in 2001. Boris Johnson's Ghostwriter

H1.text: Who wrote the book 'Friends, Voters, Countrymen' about his election as MP for Henley-on-Thames in 2001. Michael Gove

H2.text: Who wrote the book 'Friends, Voters, Countrymen' about his election as MP for Henley-on-Thames in 2001. David Cameron

H3.text: Who wrote the book 'Friends, Voters, Countrymen' about his election as MP for Henley-on-Thames in 2001. BoJo

A4.text: His 2001 book, Friends, Voters, Countrymen: Jottings on the Stump, recounted that year's election campaign.

A5.text: Johnson wrote the book Friends, Voters, Countrymen.
